ctu_text: The loan for working capital shall be sanctioned and released only after setting up of the unit. In no case the working capital included in the project shall exceed more than 25% of the project cost. \n1. If the beneficiary is already having the workshed the component of required machinery will alone constitute the project cost as per the scheme.
